<p>We were recently featured in the Spring, 2016 issue of Trend art + design + architecture magazine! Highlighting the benefits of creating shared interactive experiences, Ideum rises above the competition because we offer the whole package—we design <<i>and</i> build our own hardware and software. Therefore, we create thoughtfully designed, durable products that produce the best possible user experience utilizing the latest technology. Check out the article <a href="https://issuu.com/trendmagnm/docs/trend_spring_2016_flipbook/1">here</a>, starting on page 27, or click on the link below.</p>
